name: tm30
effect: Teaches Shadow Ball to a compatible Pokémon.
short_effect: Teaches Shadow Ball to a compatible Pokémon. (Gen I: Teleport)

flavor_text.sun_moon: The user hurls a shadowy blob at the target. This may also lower the target’s Sp. Def stat.
flavor_text.ultra_sun_ultra_moon: The user hurls a shadowy blob at the target. This may also lower the target’s Sp. Def stat.
flavor_text.lets_go_pikachu_lets_go_eevee: The user tenses its muscles to bulk up its body, raising both its Attack and Defense stats.
